data.title: Luxury Hotel in Hollywood California
data.meta_description: Loews Hollywood Hotel is a proud AAA four-diamond rated and TripAdvisor travelers' choice awarded luxury hotel in Hollywood California. Book your stay.
data.text:
SPECIAL OFFER

Suite Deals

This sweet deal includes suite accommodations, a nightly food & beverage credit, & free Wi-Fi!

And now when you book one of our well-appointed suites, youâ€™ll enjoy extra room, extra comforts and extra amenities. As always, Loews genuine and attentive service is included. Sweet dreams.

Welcome to Loews Hollywood Hotel

Style and Stature in the Hollywood Hills

The sign. The Hills. Our urban oasis at the corner of Hollywood and Highland is your perfect base for moving and shaking, Hollywood-style.

Hotel Highlights

628 luxurious guestrooms and suites

76,000 square feet of indoor function space

Rooftop pool

Ideal Hollywood location at Hollywood and Highland and close proximity to Universal Studios Hollywood

Bodega offers coffee, snacks, and all-day dining on the go.

H2 Kitchen & Bar serves drinks and bites until late

Complimentary Wi-Fi in every guest room, and in public spaces

Useful Information

Check-in: 4 PM | Check out: 11 AM

Late check-out: available at an additional charge

Age of check-in: 18

Destination Fee: $35 per day. Click here for more info.

Valet parking: $55 + tax (includes in-and-out privileges)

Self-parking: $20 + tax per vehicle, per day (does not include in-and-out privileges). Available at the Ovation Hollywood garage.

FedEx Business Center: 3rd floor; 24 hours

In-room dining: available from 6:30 AM - 11:30 PM daily

Fitness Center: 5th floor; available 24 hours (closed for cleaning 8-8:30am, 3:30-4pm, and 10-10:30pm)

Smoking is prohibited in all guestrooms. Guests will be subject to a fine if found smoking.

Pet fee: $100 non-refundable fee per stay

To request a bill from a previous stay, please visit the My Bill page or email ssccustomerservice@loewshotels.com or contact us at 1 888-320-6065

Proud to earn and maintain the AAA Four Diamond Rating and TripAdvisor Travelers' Choice award.

Whether you're here for an immersive destination experience or a relaxing Hollywood Hills getaway, the magic of the city is always within reach. From sophisticated spaces and thoughtful amenities to special offers and star-studded panoramas, your A-list stay awaits.
